question.text: You’re driving along a motorway and become tired. You should

explanation.text: Plan your journey to include rest stops. This should ensure you don’t become tired while driving and you arrive at your destination in good time.

answer.text: pull up on the hard shoulder and change drivers
leave the motorway at the next exit and rest
increase your speed and turn up the radio volume
close all your windows and set the heating to warm
